filter.name: hasSamplePublicOrUser
filter.condition: (exists (select 1 from sample_reference sr where sr.reference_id = reference_id and exists ( select 1 from samples s where s.sample_id = sr.sample_id and (s.public_data = 'Y' or s.user_id = :userId))))

hibernate-mapping.query: from Reference r where lower(r.name) = lower(:name)
select distinct name from Reference r order by r.name
